statements: SELECT * FROM rentals
SELECT rental_id, rental_date FROM rentals
SELECT customer_id, rental_date FROM rentals WHERE rental_id = 1
SELECT rental_date, customer_id, item_id FROM rentals WHERE rental_id > 5
SELECT rental_id, item_id FROM rentals ORDER BY rental_id DESC
SELECT * FROM rentals WHERE rental_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT rental_id, customer_id FROM rentals WHERE item_id = 1001 ORDER BY rental_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(rental_id) AS rental_count FROM rentals GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(rental_id) > 5;
SELECT item_id, AVG(customer_id) AS avg_customer_id FROM rentals GROUP BY item_id ORDER BY avg_customer_id DESC;
SELECT rental_id, rental_date FROM rentals WHERE rental_id IN (1001, 1002, 1003) AND customer_id = 101 ORDER BY rental_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM rental_records;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers;
SELECT id, rental_date, item_rented FROM rental_records WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM rental_records WHERE id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT rental_date, item_rented FROM rental_records WHERE customer_id = 5 ORDER BY rental_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM rental_records WHERE item_rented LIKE '%DVD%' AND rental_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS rental_count FROM rental_records GROUP BY customer_id HAVING rental_count > 5 ORDER BY rental_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM rentals;
SELECT rental_id, rental_date FROM rentals ORDER BY rental_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone = '1234567890';
SELECT item_name, item_price FROM items WHERE item_price > 50;
SELECT rental_id, item_id, customer_id FROM rentals WHERE rental_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM rentals WHERE rental_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT rental_id, customer_id, rental_date FROM rentals WHERE item_id = 101 ORDER BY rental_date DESC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, items.item_name, rentals.rental_date FROM customers JOIN rentals ON customers.customer_id = rentals.customer_id JOIN items ON rentals.item_id = items.item_id WHERE customers.customer_phone LIKE '%123%' AND items.item_price < 50;

SELECT c.customer_name, i.item_name, r.rental_date FROM customers c JOIN rentals r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id JOIN items i ON r.item_id = i.item_id WHERE r.rental_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';

SELECT customers.customer_name, items.item_name, rentals.rental_date FROM customers, rentals, items WHERE customers.customer_id = rentals.customer_id AND items.item_id = rentals.item_id AND rentals.rental_date >= '2022-02-01' ORDER BY rentals.rental_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM rentals;
SELECT rental_id, rental_date, item_id, customer_id FROM rentals;
SELECT item_name, item_description, daily_rental_price FROM items;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT rental_id, rental_date, item_id, customer_id FROM rental_history;
SELECT * FROM rentals WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM items WHERE daily_rental_price > 50.00;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT rentals.rental_id, items.item_name, customers.customer_name FROM rentals JOIN items ON rentals.item_id = items.item_id JOIN customers ON rentals.customer_id = customers.customer_id;

SELECT rental_history.rental_id, rental_history.rental_date, items.item_name, customers.customer_name FROM rental_history JOIN items ON rental_history.item_id = items.item_id JOIN customers ON rental_history.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE rental_history.rental_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_price FROM equipment ORDER BY equipment_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, rental_date, return_date FROM customers JOIN rentals ON customers.customer_id = rentals.customer_id;
SELECT rental_id, equipment_id, quantity FROM rental_items WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%555%' AND customer_id > 100 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_price FROM equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Fitness' ORDER BY equipment_price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT rental_date, return_date FROM rentals WHERE rental_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY rental_date ASC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, rental_items.quantity, equipment.equipment_name FROM customers JOIN rentals ON customers.customer_id = rentals.customer_id JOIN rental_items ON rentals.rental_id = rental_items.rental_id JOIN equipment ON rental_items.equipment_id = equipment.equipment_id WHERE customers.customer_id = 50 ORDER BY rental_items.quantity DESC;
